languages.text: "Нет!" {n}Юный ткач с криком вскидывает игольный пистолет и делает смертельный выстрел... который оказывается вовсе не смертельным. Игла с щелчком впивается в щеку Инфернус-мастера и отскакивает словно от брони. Под обвисшим лоскутом кожи видно... нечто лиловое. Хитин.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
Культист
после куя культист снова стреляет из нидлпистолета

Культист
после куя культист снова стреляет из нидлпистолета

languages.text: "No!" {n}The young spinner shrieks as he raises his needle pistol and fires a fatal shot... which turns out to not be fatal at all. The needle slices into Einrich's cheek before bouncing off harmlessly. Beneath the sagging flap of skin, you see... something purple. It is chitin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нет!" {n}Юный ткач с криком вскидывает игольный пистолет и делает смертельный выстрел... который оказывается вовсе не смертельным. Игла с щелчком впивается в щеку Инфернус-мастера и отскакивает словно от брони. Под обвисшим лоскутом кожи видно... нечто лиловое. Хитин.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "No!" {n}The young weaver shrieks as he raises his needle pistol and fires a fatal shot... which turns out to not be fatal at all. The needle slices into the Infernus Master's cheek and bounces off. Beneath the sagging flap of skin, there is... something purple. It is chitin.{/n}

"No!" {n}The young weaver shrieks as he raises his needle pistol and fires a fatal shot... which turns out to not be fatal at all. The needle slices into the Infernus Master's cheek and bounces off. Beneath the sagging flap of skin, there is... something purple. It is chitin.{/n}

"No!" {n}The young spinner shrieks as he raises his needle pistol and fires a fatal shot... which turns out to not be fatal at all. The needle slices into Einrich's cheek before bouncing off harmlessly. Beneath the sagging flap of skin, you see... something purple. It is chitin.{/n}

"No!" {n}The young spinner shrieks as he raises his needle pistol and fires a fatal shot... which turns out to not be fatal at all. The needle slices into Einrich's cheek before bouncing off harmlessly. Beneath the sagging flap of skin, you see... something purple. It is chitin.{/n}

languages.text: «¡No!». {n}El joven tejedor chilla al tiempo que levanta la pistola de agujas y dispara a la cabeza... pero no acaba con su objetivo. La aguja corta la mejilla de Einrich antes de rebotar sin infligir más daño. Bajo su piel abierta, puedes ver... algo morado. Quitina.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}The young spinner shrieks as he raises his needle pistol and fires a fatal shot... which turns out to not be fatal at all. The needle slices into Einrich's cheek before bouncing off harmlessly. Beneath the sagging flap of skin, you see... something purple. It is chitin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡No!». {n}El joven tejedor chilla al tiempo que levanta la pistola de agujas y dispara a la cabeza... pero no acaba con su objetivo. La aguja corta la mejilla de Einrich antes de rebotar sin infligir más daño. Bajo su piel abierta, puedes ver... algo morado. Quitina.{/n}

languages.text: 「ダメだ！」{n}若い紡績工は悲鳴を上げながら、ニードルピストルを振り上げ、命を奪う一発を放つ…どうやら命は奪われなかったようだ。ニードルがアインリッヒの頬を切り裂き、何事もなく跳ね返った。垂れた皮膚の下に紫色のものが見える。キチンだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}The young spinner shrieks as he raises his needle pistol and fires a fatal shot... which turns out to not be fatal at all. The needle slices into Einrich's cheek before bouncing off harmlessly. Beneath the sagging flap of skin, you see... something purple. It is chitin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ダメだ！」{n}若いウィーヴァーは悲鳴を上げながら、ニードルピストルを振り上げ、命を奪う一発を放つ…どうやら命は奪われなかったようだ。ニードルがアインリッヒの頬を切り裂き、何事もなく跳ね返った。垂れた皮膚の下に紫色のものが見える。キチンだ。{/n}

languages.text: “不！”{n}年轻的织网者举起毒针手枪，朝艾因里奇射出了致命的一枪……然而，这一枪却根本就没有致命。毒针刺入了艾因里奇的皮肤，随后被反弹回来，没有造成任何伤害。在艾因里奇松弛的皮肤下面，你看到了……某种紫色的东西，那是几丁质。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}The young spinner shrieks as he raises his needle pistol and fires a fatal shot... which turns out to not be fatal at all. The needle slices into Einrich's cheek before bouncing off harmlessly. Beneath the sagging flap of skin, you see... something purple. It is chitin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不！”{n}年轻的织网者举起毒针手枪，朝艾因里奇射出了致命的一枪……然而，这一枪却根本就没有致命。毒针刺入了艾因里奇的皮肤，随后被反弹回来，没有造成任何伤害。在艾因里奇松弛的皮肤下面，你看到了……某种紫色的东西，那是几丁质。{/n}

languages.text: "Nein!" {n}Schreiend hebt der junge Weber seine Nadelpistole und feuert einen tödlichen Schuss ab ... der sich als ganz und gar nicht tödlich erweist. Die Nadel schneidet in Einrichs Wange, bevor sie harmlos aprallt. Unter dem herunterhängenden Hautlappen, siehst du ... etwas Violettes. Es ist Chitin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}The young spinner shrieks as he raises his needle pistol and fires a fatal shot... which turns out to not be fatal at all. The needle slices into Einrich's cheek before bouncing off harmlessly. Beneath the sagging flap of skin, you see... something purple. It is chitin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nein!" {n}Schreiend hebt der junge Weber seine Nadelpistole und feuert einen tödlichen Schuss ab ... der sich als ganz und gar nicht tödlich erweist. Die Nadel schneidet in Einrichs Wange, bevor sie harmlos aprallt. Unter dem herunterhängenden Hautlappen, siehst du ... etwas Violettes. Es ist Chitin.{/n}

languages.text: « Non ! » {n}hurle le jeune tisseur en levant son pistolet à aiguilles. Mais le tir, qui aurait dû être fatal, se contente de trancher un bout de chair sur la joue d'Einrich avant de rebondir. Sous le lambeau de peau qui s'est affaissé, apparaît... quelque chose de violet. De la chitine.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}The young spinner shrieks as he raises his needle pistol and fires a fatal shot... which turns out to not be fatal at all. The needle slices into Einrich's cheek before bouncing off harmlessly. Beneath the sagging flap of skin, you see... something purple. It is chitin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Non ! » {n}hurle le jeune tisseur en levant son pistolet à aiguilles. Mais le tir, qui aurait dû être fatal, se contente de trancher un bout de chair sur la joue d'Einrich avant de rebondir. Sous le lambeau de peau qui s'est affaissé, apparaît... quelque chose de violet. De la chitine.{/n}

languages.text: "Hayır!" {n}Genç dokur bağırıyor ve iğne tabancasını kaldırıp ölümcül atışını yapıyor... Fakat o atış can almıyor. İğne, Einrich'in yanağını çiziyor ve kimseye zarar vermeden sekip gidiyor. Adamın yanağından sarkan derinin altında... Mor bir şey görüyorsun. Kitin bu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}The young spinner shrieks as he raises his needle pistol and fires a fatal shot... which turns out to not be fatal at all. The needle slices into Einrich's cheek before bouncing off harmlessly. Beneath the sagging flap of skin, you see... something purple. It is chitin.{/n}
